popularityCurve.label: it's definitely a dream to play for team canada so any time you get a call like that it's really exciting

clusterList.phrase: it's definitely a dream to play for team canada so any time you get a call like that it's really exciting
coach melrose expects me to play in the nhl this year and i know there's a lot of hard work to be done until then but i also expect to be there stamkos admitted
i feel i've trained hard and done the right things so hopefully reaching the nhl will become a reality this year
i started working as an nhl reporter back in vancouver and i was lucky to grab a chance to work as an analyst for sbs sports

i've been involved with coaches around the state even when i was in the insurance business advising them what to do with their athletes it's something i've always wanted to do always knew i could do pretty well at it i like training with the team too so to me the atmosphere is fun

i've always wanted to work with the right people coaches that fit the description of what i want to become i felt that this opportunity will allow me to get to where i want to as a coach and as a person
